title: The Harmonic Rescuer: The Tale of Alice Hayes
summary: Alice Hayes, a 42-year-old musical director, discovers her superpowers and uses them to fight crime while balancing her daily life over the span of a week.
summaryGerman: Alice Hayes, eine 42-jährige Musikdirektorin, entdeckt ihre Superkräfte und verwendet sie, um Verbrechen zu bekämpfen, während sie ihr tägliches Leben über eine Woche hinweg ausbalanciert.
summaryDutch: Alice Hayes, een 42-jarige muziekdirecteur, ontdekt haar superkrachten en gebruikt deze om misdaad te bestrijden terwijl ze haar dagelijks leven in evenwicht houdt gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Alice Hayes, une directrice musicale de 42 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs et les utilise pour lutter contre le crime tout en équilibrant sa vie quotidienne sur une semaine.

story.text: Alice discovers her ability to manipulate sound waves while directing a chaotic orchestra rehearsal. She feels both surprised and energetic.
Using her newfound powers, Alice prevents a robbery by stunning the thieves with a high-pitch sound. She returns home feeling triumphant.
Trying to understand her powers, Alice visits a scientist friend who studies sound. The atmosphere turns eerie when they realize the potential dangers.
Alice uses her powers to communicate with a lost child in a crowd, guiding him back to his parents through whispered directions only he can hear. Her mood is peaceful.
Excited about the possibilities, Alice organizes a small concert where her music not only entertains but also heals, leaving the audience in a romantic spell.
News of her deeds reaches a villain who attempts to capture her. An epic battle ensues with Alice using the rhythm of her music to outmaneuver her foe.
After a tumultuous week, Alice performs a solo on her balcony, feeling that the simple act of playing is what truly brings happiness and balance to her life.

ending: With a melody in her heart and harmony around her, Alice Hayes stood ready to face any new challenges that might come her way.
moral: True power lies not just in strength, but in using one's gifts to harmonize and heal.
